testcase.name: gg_km_works_with_default_inputs
testcase.system-out: Use of .data in tidyselect expressions was deprecated in tidyselect 1.2.0. i Please use `"row_name"` instead of `.data$row_name` Backtrace: ▆ 1. ├─testthat::expect_no_error(...) at test-gg_km.R:32:3 2. │ └─testthat:::expect_no_(...) 3. │ └─testthat:::quasi_capture(enquo(object), NULL, capture) 4. │ ├─testthat (local) .capture(...) 5. │ │ ├─base::withRestarts(...) 6. │ │ │ └─base (local) withOneRestart(expr, restarts[[1L]]) 7. │ │ │ └─base (local) doWithOneRestart(return(expr), restart) 8. │ │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 9. │ └─rlang::eval_bare(quo_get_expr(.quo), quo_get_env(.quo)) 10. └─crane::annotate_riskdf(...) 11. └─crane:::df2gg(...) 12. ├─dplyr::mutate(...) 13. ├─dplyr::arrange(...) 14. ├─tidyr::pivot_longer(...) 15. └─tidyr:::pivot_longer.data.frame(...) 16. └─tidyr::build_longer_spec(...) 17. └─tidyselect::eval_select(...) 18. └─tidyselect:::eval_select_impl(...) 19. ├─tidyselect:::with_subscript_errors(...) 20. │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 21. └─tidyselect:::vars_select_eval(...) 22. └─tidyselect:::walk_data_tree(expr, data_mask, context_mask) 23. └─tidyselect:::eval_minus(expr, data_mask, context_mask, error_call) 24. └─tidyselect:::eval_bang(expr, data_mask, context_mask) 25. └─tidyselect:::walk_data_tree(expr[[2]], data_mask, context_mask) 26. └─tidyselect:::expr_kind(expr, context_mask, error_call) 27. └─tidyselect:::call_kind(expr, context_mask, error_call)

testcase.name: df2gg_works_with_proper_x_axis_and_without
testcase.system-out: Use of .data in tidyselect expressions was deprecated in tidyselect 1.2.0. i Please use `"row_name"` instead of `.data$row_name` Backtrace: ▆ 1. ├─testthat::expect_no_error(null <- df2gg(df, font_size = 8, add_proper_xaxis = TRUE)) at test-gg_km.R:54:3 2. │ └─testthat:::expect_no_(...) 3. │ └─testthat:::quasi_capture(enquo(object), NULL, capture) 4. │ ├─testthat (local) .capture(...) 5. │ │ ├─base::withRestarts(...) 6. │ │ │ └─base (local) withOneRestart(expr, restarts[[1L]]) 7. │ │ │ └─base (local) doWithOneRestart(return(expr), restart) 8. │ │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 9. │ └─rlang::eval_bare(quo_get_expr(.quo), quo_get_env(.quo)) 10. └─crane:::df2gg(df, font_size = 8, add_proper_xaxis = TRUE) 11. ├─dplyr::mutate(...) 12. ├─dplyr::arrange(...) 13. ├─tidyr::pivot_longer(...) 14. └─tidyr:::pivot_longer.data.frame(...) 15. └─tidyr::build_longer_spec(...) 16. └─tidyselect::eval_select(...) 17. └─tidyselect:::eval_select_impl(...) 18. ├─tidyselect:::with_subscript_errors(...) 19. │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 20. └─tidyselect:::vars_select_eval(...) 21. └─tidyselect:::walk_data_tree(expr, data_mask, context_mask) 22. └─tidyselect:::eval_minus(expr, data_mask, context_mask, error_call) 23. └─tidyselect:::eval_bang(expr, data_mask, context_mask) 24. └─tidyselect:::walk_data_tree(expr[[2]], data_mask, context_mask) 25. └─tidyselect:::expr_kind(expr, context_mask, error_call) 26. └─tidyselect:::call_kind(expr, context_mask, error_call)

testcase.name: test_g_forest_works
testcase.system-out:
Using an external vector in selections was deprecated in tidyselect 1.1.0. i Please use `all_of()` or `any_of()` instead. # Was: data %>% select(rsp)
# Now: data %>% select(all_of(rsp))
See <https://tidyselect.r-lib.org/reference/faq-external-vector.html>. Backtrace: ▆ 1. ├─testthat::expect_no_error(...) at test-forestplot.R:11:3 2. │ └─testthat:::expect_no_(...) 3. │ └─testthat:::quasi_capture(enquo(object), NULL, capture) 4. │ ├─testthat (local) .capture(...) 5. │ │ ├─base::withRestarts(...) 6. │ │ │ └─base (local) withOneRestart(expr, restarts[[1L]]) 7. │ │ │ └─base (local) doWithOneRestart(return(expr), restart) 8. │ │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 9. │ └─rlang::eval_bare(quo_get_expr(.quo), quo_get_env(.quo)) 10. ├─trial %>% ... 11. └─crane::tbl_roche_subgroups(...) 12. ├─gtsummary::modify_column_hide(...) 13. │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 14. ├─gtsummary::modify_table_body(...) 15. │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 16. ├─gtsummary::modify_column_hide(...) 17. │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 18. ├─gtsummary::tbl_merge(...) 19. ├─gtsummary::modify_header(...) 20. │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 21. └─gtsummary::tbl_summary(...) 22. ├─cards::process_selectors(...) 23. └─cards:::process_selectors.data.frame(...) 24. └─cards:::imap(...) 25. └─cards:::map2(.x, names(.x) %||% seq_along(.x), .f, ...) 26. └─base::mapply(.f, .x, .y, MoreArgs = list(...), SIMPLIFY = FALSE) 27. └─cards (local) `<fn>`(dots[[1L]][[2L]], dots[[2L]][[2L]]) 28. └─cards::cards_select(...) 29. ├─base::tryCatch(...) 30. │ └─base (local) tryCatchList(expr, classes, parentenv, handlers) 31. │ └─base (local) tryCatchOne(expr, names, parentenv, handlers[[1L]]) 32. │ └─base (local) doTryCatch(return(expr), name, parentenv, handler) 33. └─tidyselect::eval_select(expr = expr, data = data, ...) 34. └─tidyselect:::eval_select_impl(...) 35. ├─tidyselect:::with_subscript_errors(...) 36. │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 37. └─tidyselect:::vars_select_eval(...) 38. └─tidyselect:::walk_data_tree(expr, data_mask, context_mask) 39. └─tidyselect:::eval_sym(expr, data_mask, context_mask)

testcase.name: test_g_forest_works
testcase.system-out:
Using an external vector in selections was deprecated in tidyselect 1.1.0. i Please use `all_of()` or `any_of()` instead. # Was: data %>% select(by)
# Now: data %>% select(all_of(by))
See <https://tidyselect.r-lib.org/reference/faq-external-vector.html>. Backtrace: ▆ 1. ├─testthat::expect_no_error(...) at test-forestplot.R:11:3 2. │ └─testthat:::expect_no_(...) 3. │ └─testthat:::quasi_capture(enquo(object), NULL, capture) 4. │ ├─testthat (local) .capture(...) 5. │ │ ├─base::withRestarts(...) 6. │ │ │ └─base (local) withOneRestart(expr, restarts[[1L]]) 7. │ │ │ └─base (local) doWithOneRestart(return(expr), restart) 8. │ │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 9. │ └─rlang::eval_bare(quo_get_expr(.quo), quo_get_env(.quo)) 10. ├─trial %>% ... 11. └─crane::tbl_roche_subgroups(...) 12. ├─gtsummary::modify_column_hide(...) 13. │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 14. ├─gtsummary::modify_table_body(...) 15. │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 16. ├─gtsummary::modify_column_hide(...) 17. │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 18. ├─gtsummary::tbl_merge(...) 19. └─gtsummary::tbl_strata(...) 20. └─gtsummary:::tbl_strata_internal(...) 21. ├─cards::process_selectors(...) 22. └─cards:::process_selectors.data.frame(...) 23. └─cards:::imap(...) 24. └─cards:::map2(.x, names(.x) %||% seq_along(.x), .f, ...) 25. └─base::mapply(.f, .x, .y, MoreArgs = list(...), SIMPLIFY = FALSE) 26. └─cards (local) `<fn>`(dots[[1L]][[1L]], dots[[2L]][[1L]]) 27. └─cards::cards_select(...) 28. ├─base::tryCatch(...) 29. │ └─base (local) tryCatchList(expr, classes, parentenv, handlers) 30. │ └─base (local) tryCatchOne(expr, names, parentenv, handlers[[1L]]) 31. │ └─base (local) doTryCatch(return(expr), name, parentenv, handler) 32. └─tidyselect::eval_select(expr = expr, data = data, ...) 33. └─tidyselect:::eval_select_impl(...) 34. ├─tidyselect:::with_subscript_errors(...) 35. │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 36. └─tidyselect:::vars_select_eval(...) 37. └─tidyselect:::walk_data_tree(expr, data_mask, context_mask) 38. └─tidyselect:::eval_sym(expr, data_mask, context_mask)

testcase.name: test_g_forest_works
testcase.system-out:
There were 4 warnings in `dplyr::mutate()`. The first warning was: i In argument: `tbl = switch(...)`. Caused by warning: ! Using an external vector in selections was deprecated in tidyselect 1.1.0. i Please use `all_of()` or `any_of()` instead. # Was: data %>% select(rsp)
# Now: data %>% select(all_of(rsp))
See <https://tidyselect.r-lib.org/reference/faq-external-vector.html>. i Run `dplyr::last_dplyr_warnings()` to see the 3 remaining warnings. Backtrace: ▆ 1. ├─testthat::expect_no_error(...) at test-forestplot.R:11:3 2. │ └─testthat:::expect_no_(...) 3. │ └─testthat:::quasi_capture(enquo(object), NULL, capture) 4. │ ├─testthat (local) .capture(...) 5. │ │ ├─base::withRestarts(...) 6. │ │ │ └─base (local) withOneRestart(expr, restarts[[1L]]) 7. │ │ │ └─base (local) doWithOneRestart(return(expr), restart) 8. │ │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 9. │ └─rlang::eval_bare(quo_get_expr(.quo), quo_get_env(.quo)) 10. ├─trial %>% ... 11. ├─crane::tbl_roche_subgroups(...) 12. │ ├─gtsummary::modify_column_hide(...) 13. │ │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 14. │ ├─gtsummary::modify_table_body(...) 15. │ │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 16. │ ├─gtsummary::modify_column_hide(...) 17. │ │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 18. │ ├─gtsummary::tbl_merge(...) 19. │ └─gtsummary::tbl_strata(...) 20. │ └─gtsummary:::tbl_strata_internal(...) 21. │ └─... %>% ... 22. ├─dplyr::mutate(...) 23. └─dplyr:::mutate.data.frame(...) 24. └─dplyr:::mutate_cols(.data, dplyr_quosures(...), by) 25. └─dplyr:::signal_warnings(warnings_state, error_call)

└─cards::cards_select(...) 36. ├─base::tryCatch(...) 37. │ └─base (local) tryCatchList(expr, classes, parentenv, handlers) 38. │ └─base (local) tryCatchOne(expr, names, parentenv, handlers[[1L]]) 39. │ └─base (local) doTryCatch(return(expr), name, parentenv, handler) 40. └─tidyselect::eval_select(expr = expr, data = data, ...) 41. └─tidyselect:::eval_select_impl(...) 42. ├─tidyselect:::with_subscript_errors(...) 43. │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 44. └─tidyselect:::vars_select_eval(...) 45. └─tidyselect:::walk_data_tree(expr, data_mask, context_mask) 46. testcase.name: test_g_forest_works
testcase.system-out: Use of .data in tidyselect expressions was deprecated in tidyselect 1.2.0. i Please use `"groupname_col"` instead of `.data$groupname_col` Backtrace: ▆ 1. ├─testthat::expect_no_error(...) at test-forestplot.R:11:3 2. │ └─testthat:::expect_no_(...) 3. │ └─testthat:::quasi_capture(enquo(object), NULL, capture) 4. │ ├─testthat (local) .capture(...) 5. │ │ ├─base::withRestarts(...) 6. │ │ │ └─base (local) withOneRestart(expr, restarts[[1L]]) 7. │ │ │ └─base (local) doWithOneRestart(return(expr), restart) 8. │ │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 9. │ └─rlang::eval_bare(quo_get_expr(.quo), quo_get_env(.quo)) 10. ├─trial %>% ... 11. └─crane::tbl_roche_subgroups(...) 12. ├─gtsummary::tbl_stack(...) 13. │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(tbls, "list") 14. └─purrr::map(...) 15. └─purrr:::map_("list", .x, .f, ..., .progress = .progress) 16. ├─purrr:::with_indexed_errors(...) 17. │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 18. ├─purrr:::call_with_cleanup(...) 19. └─crane (local) .f(.x[[i]], ...) 20. └─gtsummary::modify_table_body(...) 21. ├─base::tryCatch(...) 22. │ └─base (local) tryCatchList(expr, classes, parentenv, handlers) 23. │ └─base (local) tryCatchOne(expr, names, parentenv, handlers[[1L]]) 24. │ └─base (local) doTryCatch(return(expr), name, parentenv, handler) 25. └─gtsummary:::map(.x = list(x$table_body), .f = fun, ...) 26. └─base::lapply(.x, .f, ...) 27. └─crane (local) FUN(X[[i]], ...) 28. ├─dplyr::bind_rows(...) 29. │ └─rlang::list2(...) 30. ├─dplyr::select(...) 31. └─dplyr:::select.data.frame(...) 32. └─tidyselect::eval_select(expr(c(...)), data = .data, error_call = error_call) 33. └─tidyselect:::eval_select_impl(...) 34. ├─tidyselect:::with_subscript_errors(...) 35. │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 36. └─tidyselect:::vars_select_eval(...) 37. └─tidyselect:::walk_data_tree(expr, data_mask, context_mask) 38. └─tidyselect:::eval_c(expr, data_mask, context_mask) 39. └─tidyselect:::reduce_sels(node, data_mask, context_mask, init = init) 40. └─tidyselect:::walk_data_tree(new, data_mask, context_mask) 41. └─tidyselect:::expr_kind(expr, context_mask, error_call) 42. testcase.name: test_g_forest_works
testcase.system-out:
Using an external vector in selections was deprecated in tidyselect 1.1.0. i Please use `all_of()` or `any_of()` instead. # Was: data %>% select(x)
# Now: data %>% select(all_of(x))
See <https://tidyselect.r-lib.org/reference/faq-external-vector.html>. Backtrace: ▆ 1. ├─testthat::expect_no_error(...) at test-forestplot.R:11:3 2. │ └─testthat:::expect_no_(...) 3. │ └─testthat:::quasi_capture(enquo(object), NULL, capture) 4. │ ├─testthat (local) └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 9. │ └─rlang::eval_bare(quo_get_expr(.quo), quo_get_env(.quo)) 10. ├─trial %>% ... 11. └─crane::tbl_roche_subgroups(...) 12. ├─gtsummary::tbl_stack(...) 13. │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(tbls, "list") 14. └─purrr::map(...) 15. └─purrr:::map_("list", .x, .f, ..., .progress = .progress) 16. ├─purrr:::with_indexed_errors(...) 17. │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 18. ├─purrr:::call_with_cleanup(...) 19. └─crane (local) .f(.x[[i]], ...) 20. ├─gtsummary::modify_table_body(...) 21. │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 22. ├─gtsummary::modify_column_hide(...) 23. │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 24. ├─gtsummary::tbl_merge(...) 25. ├─gtsummary::modify_header(...) 26. │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 27. └─gtsummary::tbl_strata(...) 28. └─gtsummary:::tbl_strata_internal(...) 29. ├─cards::process_selectors(...) 30. └─cards:::process_selectors.data.frame(...) 31. └─cards:::imap(...) 32. testcase.name: test_g_forest_works
testcase.system-out:
There were 4 warnings in `dplyr::mutate()`. The first warning was: i In argument: `tbl = switch(...)`. Caused by warning: ! Using an external vector in selections was deprecated in tidyselect 1.1.0. i Please use `all_of()` or `any_of()` instead. # Was: data %>% select(rsp)
# Now: data %>% select(all_of(rsp))
See <https://tidyselect.r-lib.org/reference/faq-external-vector.html>. i Run `dplyr::last_dplyr_warnings()` to see the 3 remaining warnings. Backtrace: ▆ 1. ├─testthat::expect_no_error(...) at test-forestplot.R:11:3 2. │ └─testthat:::expect_no_(...) 3. │ └─testthat:::quasi_capture(enquo(object), NULL, capture) 4. │ ├─testthat (local) .capture(...) 5. │ │ ├─base::withRestarts(...) 6. │ │ │ └─base (local) withOneRestart(expr, restarts[[1L]]) 7. │ │ │ └─base (local) doWithOneRestart(return(expr), restart) 8. │ │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 9. │ └─rlang::eval_bare(quo_get_expr(.quo), quo_get_env(.quo)) 10. ├─trial %>% ... 11. ├─crane::tbl_roche_subgroups(...) 12. │ ├─gtsummary::tbl_stack(...) 13. │ │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(tbls, "list") 14. │ └─purrr::map(...) 15. │ └─purrr:::map_("list", .x, .f, ..., .progress = .progress) 16. │ ├─purrr:::with_indexed_errors(...) 17. │ │ └─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 18. │ ├─purrr:::call_with_cleanup(...) 19. │ └─crane (local) .f(.x[[i]], ...) 20. │ ├─gtsummary::modify_table_body(...) 21. │ │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 22. │ ├─gtsummary::modify_column_hide(...) 23. │ │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 24. │ ├─gtsummary::tbl_merge(...) 25. │ ├─gtsummary::modify_header(...) 26. │ │ └─gtsummary:::check_class(x, "gtsummary") 27. │ └─gtsummary::tbl_strata(...) 28. │ └─gtsummary:::tbl_strata_internal(...) 29. │ └─... %>% ... 30. ├─dplyr::mutate(...) 31. └─dplyr:::mutate.data.frame(...) 32. └─dplyr:::mutate_cols(.data, dplyr_quosures(...), by) 33. └─dplyr:::signal_warnings(warnings_state, error_call)
